com.dpsframework.util

Class CommandLineReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.Reader
      • java.io.FilterReader
        • com.dpsframework.util.CommandLineReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.lang.Readable

    public class CommandLineReader
extends java.io.FilterReader
    This is a quick hack to turn empty lines entered interactively on the command line into ';\n' empty lines for the interpreter. It's just more pleasant to be able to hit return on an empty line and see the prompt reappear.
    Since:
    2015, update at: 2018-07-15
    Version:
    1.7 (Build.1814)
    Author:
    Francisco J. Aguayo (Leon University / IEEE Power & Energy Systems Society Member)
